SpellDef.Description: Order a Leather armor set.
Order a Chainmail armor set
Order a Light Platemail armor set
Order a Plate Mail armor set
Order a Masterwork Chainmail armor set
Order enchanted items in bulk
Order Mystantum armor set and sword in bulk
Order advanced enchanted items in bulk
Order a Champion's Armor set
Order a Pinnacle Plate Mail armor set. Can be used only once per game!
Order a Pinnacle Chain Mail armor set. Can only be used once per game!
Craft a Transcendent Plate Armor set. Transcendent plate focuses on increasing the owner's defense and survivability to superhuman levels.
Craft a Transcendent Chainmail Armor set. Transcendent chain armor is enchanted to augment the performance of the owner as much as protect them.
Craft a Transcendent Sword.
Craft a Transcendent Sword.
Craft a Transcendent Axe.
Craft a Transcendent Blunt Weapon.
Craft a Transcendent Bow.
Craft a Transcendent Spear.
Order the full set of trained-unit-eligible high-end arcane weapons.
Order a pinnacle sword, axe, pike, maul, and bow. Only one pinnacle weapon set can be ordered per game!
Order an expedition that will return a piece of weathered equipment. There is a small chance of a rare artifact being found instead...
Order a pair of horses as mounts.
Order a pair of undead horses as mounts.
Order a pair of warhorses as mounts.
Order a pair of Wargs as mounts.
Order food and equipment to keep your champions well supplied.
Order equipment to keep your champions well supplied.
Order three especially enchanted charms for your champions.
Order three especially enchanted glyph stones for your champions.
Order three especially enchanted cloaks for your champions.
Order a powerful enchanted sword and Maul.
Create the ultimate Axe.
Create the ultimate Pike.
Create the ultimate sword.
Create the ultimate blunt weapon.
Create the ultimate bow.
Create the ultimate set of armor, wearable by any champion (no armor proficiency required).
